name: Wombat Wars
description:
WOMBAT WARS

Wombats used to live in peace in different tribes or Mahuas, as they call them. Now some hunters are capturing them to use them as slaves. Become E-Mahua, the unifier, the only one who can lead the three Mahua tribes and repel the invaders. But don't forget to ask your mates for a cigarette, E-mahua needs them to continue with the adventure. He also loves beer as hell, help him drink to defeat the bad guys!

To do:

-More/ better Enemies

-More Features for main character

-More/better maps

-Storing hiscores between games

-Credits, we forgive but don't forget
